question_text:
Question 9 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
NAT (1M) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Question ID : 823251555 
 
Three processes arrive at time zero with CPU bursts time of 16, 20 & 10 milliseconds. If the scheduler 
has prior knowledge about the length of CPU bursts, Minimum achievable average waiting time for this 
three processes in a non-preemptive scheduler (rounded to nearest integer) is______ milliseconds. 
Ans. 
12 
Sol. 
Gantt chart :  
A 
C 
B
